name: One Night With Haro
description:
One Night With Haro it's an Indie 2d-Action-Adventure video game
made by Emm Tyman in Madborn Studios. The story of this game
is about Greek Mystology in modern days! Explore, have fun and
chalenge yourself with Boss fights, learning skills and more!

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 9 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 9 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
GAMEPAD SUPPORT

Xbox,PS3,PS4
